channel.title: SEPIA RVP Radio
channel.description: Join SEPIA RVP Radio each week live from Para-x as we interview different guest in the paranormal world and get their views and opinions on many many things. Join us for a great time.
channel.itunes:subtitle: SEPIA RVP on Para-x
channel.itunes:author: Eric Dionne
channel.itunes:summary: Join SEPIA RVP Radio each week live from Para-x as we interview different guest in the paranormal world and get their views and opinions on many many things. Join us for a great time.

item.title: SEPIA RVP ZOMBIE Show with Guest PJNC Oct 19 2009
item.description: Join SEPIA RVP as we talk with Local Pagen group PJNC here in Jacksonville, NC. We'll have Shar and Virgina on with us, and discuss from one end of the rope to the other. You won't wanna miss this one. Plus we'll be giving away 2 tickets to The Paranormal Investigators Convention for this November. www.ls-pic.org So we'll see you then. AND We Were ZOMBIES
item.dc:creator: Eric Dionne
item.itunes:summary: Join SEPIA RVP as we talk with Local Pagen group PJNC here in Jacksonville, NC. We'll have Shar and Virgina on with us, and discuss from one end of the rope to the other. You won't wanna miss this one. Plus we'll be giving away 2 tickets to The Paranormal Investigators Convention for this November. www.ls-pic.org So we'll see you then. AND We Were ZOMBIES

item.title: SEPIA RVP with The Scream Queen Amy Williamson
item.description: Join us as we talk with the Scream Queen herself Amy Williamson also the Founder of The League of Paranormal Woman and the host of Para Woman Scream Radio.. This was a great show and we had lots of fun, didn't get the Queen to Scream because she was alittle under the weather but She'll call in sometime to scream for us...
item.dc:creator: Eric Dionne
item.itunes:summary: Join us as we talk with the Scream Queen herself Amy Williamson also the Founder of The League of Paranormal Woman and the host of Para Woman Scream Radio.. This was a great show and we had lots of fun, didn't get the Queen to Scream because she was alittle under the weather but She'll call in sometime to scream for us...

item.title: SEPIA RVP HERBALISM Show with Master Bill Frost
item.description: Join the SEPIA Crew as they talk about Natural Detox w/ Master Bill Frost Master Herbalism and Master of many other things, this is a very very very informative show that you all don't wanna miss and you'll learn alot from it...
item.dc:creator: Eric Dionne
item.itunes:summary: Join the SEPIA Crew as they talk about Natural Detox w/ Master Bill Frost Master Herbalism and Master of many other things, this is a very very very informative show that you all don't wanna miss and you'll learn alot from it...

item.title: SEPIA RVP with Rob Thompson and Eric drinking wine
item.description: We interview Rob Thompson, author of "From Hell: The Final Days of Jack the Ripper" and have a blast with the lovely Dave Donger. Hear lightweight Eric drinking a bottle of wine and bringing hilarity to the show!
item.dc:creator: Eric Dionne
item.itunes:summary: We interview Rob Thompson, author of "From Hell: The Final Days of Jack the Ripper" and have a blast with the lovely Dave Donger. Hear lightweight Eric drinking a bottle of wine and bringing hilarity to the show!

item.title: SEPIA RVP Interviews Keith Johnson Demonologist
item.description: In this episode we interview Keith Johnson one of the Leading Demonologist in the Paranormal Field and also give away 2 of his books Paranormal Realities. We discuss many things from possesion to how to protect and all that in between. This was a great show with lots of call in questions and chat questions. Be sure to catch us live on Monday Nights from 10pm to Midnight on www.para-x.com and catch past shows here and even more shows at www.sepianc.com Thanks for the support we love you all. Eric, Jess, and Amy

item.title: SEPIA RVP GET SHOCKED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
item.description: Ok so we had Nightstalkers from MI on the show with us along with Father O'leery. But the highlight of the show was when Eric got the shock of his life. If you missed the video feed be sure to visit www.sepianc.com and go the the SEPIA RVP link to watch the video and hear the show or www.para-x.com and click the Live Video link up top.. Gonna love this show

item.title: SEPIA RVP Interview Cal Gearon from SPECTORS
item.description: Ok folks you don't wanna miss this show I promise you this. Here's a guy that says he's inviting an ORB Catcher? Seriouly and to top it off everything he see he believes is haunted. I promise you you'll think different about the paranormal after this show. So enjoy as your Host Eric, Jess and Amy talk with SPECTORS from NJ. Don't forget to catch us live on monday nights from 10pm to Midnight on www.para-x.com

item.title: SEPIA RVP with John Zaffis, Gavin Cromwell, Jason and Chris with GRASP
item.description: Join us as we talk with the Teams that went to Ft. Mifflin and discuss everything that took place and happened there from listen to EVPs again to funny stories that took place.
item.dc:creator: Eric Dionne
item.itunes:summary: Join us as we talk with the Teams that went to Ft. Mifflin and discuss everything that took place and happened there from listen to EVPs again to funny stories that took place.

item.title: SEPIA RVP Interview with Britt from TAPS and Ghosthunters
item.description: Join Eric, Jess and Amy as they interview Britt from Televisions TAPS and Ghosthunters. As always you never know what to expect from SEPIA and their guest. To view webshow visit www.sepianc.com
